document.full_text: another midshipman was expelled from the u.s. naval academy for using or having a banned marijuana-like substance known as "spice," bringing the total number expelled to 12, officials said.
document.title: naval academy expels another student for using "spice"
lines_and_colors: another midshipman was expelled from the u.s. naval academy for using or having a banned marijuana-like substance known as "spice," bringing the total number expelled to 12, officials said.
